text: Kelly Clarkson is adding to her Meaning of Life Tour, and she's inviting another female voice. Maggie Rose has been selected as the third opening act on Clarkson's 2019 trek. She'll join Clarkson for a total of three dates ; on March 9 at the PPL Center in Allentown, Pa., and a two - night stay at Mohegan Sun Arena in Uncasville, Conn., on March 14 and 15. Rose made her debut on the country scene in 2010 with her cover of Kings of Leon's ` ` Use Somebody'' under the name of Margaret Durante.
